text: Fehmarn () is an island in the Baltic Sea, off the eastern coast of Schleswig- Holstein, Germany. It is the third largest island in Germany, after RÃ¼gen and Usedom. Fehmarn is about 18 km south of the Danish island of Lolland by the Fehmarn Belt. The island belongs to Ostholstein. == References == == Other websites == * Category:Towns in Schleswig-Holstein Category:Islands of Germany
title: Fehmarn
